overview: Set in the splendor and terror of the Spanish Inquisition, Flame in the Wind tells the story of Carlos, an earnest young nobleman who is faced with a choice: the church system offers safety, protection, and respectability; the Scriptures offer Christ and salvation from sinâ€”and with these torture and death.
tagline: Set in the splendor and terror of the Spanish Inquisition
title: Flame in the Wind
